summary.span: 在 Win32 窗口中呈现 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 内容。

span.span: Presents Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) content in a Win32 window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > Internet 安全区域中，很多此类的成员将不可用。Many members of this class are unavailable in the Internet security zone. 实现[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]窗口中可以包含[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]内容。An implements a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window that can contain [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]排列窗口中的内容，为度量单位，并呈现; 并且是交互式的输入。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content in the window is arranged, measured, and rendered; and is interactive to input. 因为专门用于与进行互操作[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]，此类公开了多个低级别[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]功能。Because the is specifically designed to interoperate with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)], this class exposes several low-level [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] features. 此类可用于执行以下操作：You can use this class to do the following: - 指定的窗口样式，窗口类样式，并扩展窗口样式。Specify window styles, window class styles, and extended window styles. - 将挂钩的窗口过程。Hook the window procedure. - 提供访问权限的窗口句柄 (HWND)。Provide access to the window handle (HWND). - 销毁窗口。Destroy the window. 类用于常规互操作性，因此并非设计作为托管的 HWND 包装。The class is designed for general interoperability and is not designed as a managed HWND wrapper. 一般情况下，它不提供用于操作的窗口或检查其状态的属性的托管方法。In general, it does not provide managed methods for manipulating the window or properties for inspecting its state. 相反，类提供对访问[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]窗口句柄 (HWND) 通过属性，可以通过 PInvoke 技术传递[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)][!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]以操作该窗口。Instead, the class provides access to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window handle (HWND) through the property, which can be passed by means of PInvoke techniques to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] in order to manipulate the window. **构造****Construction** 许多方面只能在构造时指定。Many aspects of the can only be specified at construction time. 若要创建，首先创建结构，并在填充所需的参数。To create an , first create an structure and populate it with the desired parameters. 这些参数包括：These parameters include the following: - 类、 窗口和扩展的窗口样式。The class, window, and extended window styles. 必须使用 PInvoke 创建窗口之后更改样式。You must use PInvoke to change the styles after the window is created. 创建窗口后，可以更改不是所有样式。Not all styles can be changed after the window is created. 请查阅[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]文档，然后再更改窗口样式。Consult the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] documentation before changing window styles. - 窗口的初始位置。The initial position of the window. - 窗口中，其中包括是否指定的大小，或应根据确定的大小的初始大小[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]内容。The initial size of the window, which includes whether the size is specified or should be determined from the determined size of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content. - 父窗口。The parent window. - 要包含在窗口过程链中。The to include in the window procedure chain. 如果在构造时指定了挂钩，它接收窗口的所有消息。If you specify a hook at construction time, it receives all messages for the window. 可以使用来添加挂钩后创建窗口。You can use to add a hook after the window is created. - 透明度设置。The transparency settings. 顶级窗口可以配置为与其他 windows 桌面上的每像素透明度根据 blend[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]内容。A top-level window can be configured to blend with the other windows on the desktop according to the per-pixel transparency of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content. 若要启用此功能，设置中的属性到`true`。To enable this, set the property in the to `true`. 此属性只能在构造时，只能通过指定构造函数签名，并实施几个限制。This property can only be specified at construction time, and only through the constructor signature, and it imposes several limitations. 在填充后结构，请将其传递给构造函数。After you populate the structure, pass it to the constructor for the . **对象生存期****Object Lifetime** 是一个常规[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]对象，并且其生存期由垃圾回收器。An is a regular [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] object, and its lifetime is managed by the garbage collector. 因为表示非托管的资源实现。Because the represents an unmanaged resource, implements . 以同步方式调用立即销毁[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]窗口，如果从所有者线程中调用。Synchronously calling immediately destroys the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window if called from the owner thread. 如果从另一个线程调用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]以异步方式销毁窗口。If called from another thread, the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window is destroyed asynchronously. 调用显式互操作代码中可能所需的特定互操作方案。Calling explicitly from the interoperating code might be necessary for certain interoperation scenarios. **窗口过程****Window Procedures** 类实现其自己的窗口过程。The class implements its own window procedure. 此窗口过程是用于处理重要的窗口消息，例如那些与布局、 呈现和输入。This window procedure is used to process important window messages, such as those related to layout, rendering, and input. 但是，你可以将窗口过程挂钩供自己使用。However, you can also hook the window procedure for your own use. 可以通过设置在构造期间指定您自己的挂钩属性，则您还可以使用和添加和删除挂钩后创建窗口。You can specify your own hook during construction by setting the property, or you can also use and to add and remove hooks after the window is created. 后进先出顺序，这使挂钩内置处理之前执行调用挂钩。The hooks are called by last-in first-out order, which enables your hooks to execute before the built-in processing. 实际挂钩所持有的弱引用。The actual hooks are held by a weak reference. 因此，请确保您管理您的挂钩委托的生存期。Therefore, make sure that you manage the lifetime of your hook delegate. 有关详细信息和其他互操作的类，请参阅[WPF 和 Win32 互操作](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-and-win32-interoperation.md)。For more information about and other interoperation classes, see [WPF and Win32 Interoperation](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-and-win32-interoperation.md). 请注意如何的构造函数采用类似于的参数的参数[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]之类的函数[CreateWindowEx](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=98462)。Notice how the constructors for take parameters that resemble the parameters for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] functions such as [CreateWindowEx](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=98462). 缩放转换应不会应用于的。Scale transformations should not be applied to the of an . 请参阅备注。See Remarks for .

param.name: parameters
param.span: 包含创建窗口所需的参数的结构。

span.span: A structure that contains the parameters that are required to create the window.

summary.span: 通过使用包含初始设置的结构初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using a structure that contains the initial settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法的 Internet 安全区域中不可用。This method is not available in the Internet security zone. 此构造函数签名可能会在某些情况下，更方便，因为默认结构包含一些适当的初始默认值。This constructor signature might be more convenient in certain situations, because the default structure contains some appropriate initial default values. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果使用此签名，不要使用默认值构造函数来构造结构`parameters`值。If you use this signature, do not use the default constructor to construct the structure for the `parameters` value. 必须使用可用于指定初始窗口名称的构造函数。You must use the constructor that enables you to specify an initial window name. 如果使用默认值构造函数，并创建，不显示因为初始窗口名称是构造所必需的表示的 HWND。If you use the default constructor and create an with it, that does not display because an initial window name is a construction requirement for the represented HWND.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建时设置此值通过设置参数。This value is set when you create the by setting the parameter. 默认值由属性。The default value is determined by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddHook(class System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceHook hook) cil managed

param.name: hook
param.span: 接收窗口消息的处理程序实现（基于 委托）。

span.span: The handler implementation (based on the delegate) that receives the window messages.

summary.span: 添加接收所有窗口消息的事件处理程序。

span.span: Adds an event handler that receives all window messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法的 Internet 安全区域中不可用。This method is not available in the Internet security zone. 大多数[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]消息在该到达有近似[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]等效。Most [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] messages that reach the have an approximate [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] equivalent. 您使用来处理该消息没有的情况[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]等效。You use to handle the cases where the message has no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] equivalent. 委托类似于的参数配置文件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]主窗口过程。The delegate resembles the parameter profile of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] main window procedure. 所有窗口都消息的主窗口过程父窗口收到同样会转发到委托。All window messages that the main window procedure of the parent window receives are also forwarded to the delegates. 它们的添加顺序调用挂钩。Hooks are called in the order that they were added. 如果任何挂钩返回`handled` = `true`对于消息之后它, 按调用顺序的挂钩不调用该消息。If any hook returns `handled`=`true` for a message, the hooks after it in the call order are not called for that message.

span.span: to add handling.
Associated enumeration:

summary.span: 当布局导致 自动调整大小时发生。

span.span: Occurs when layout causes the to automatically resize.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本机行为是自动重设大小的内容和更改通过报告所基于的窗口区域[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]布局系统。The native behavior of is to automatically resize content and the window region based on changes reported through the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] layout system. 如果当前最小化，或如果窗口不会调整大小设置为。The window does not resize if it is currently minimized or if is set to .

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新实例具有设置为此默认值，除非一个不同的值作为参数传递给特定的实例，通过使用构造函数属性。New instances of have set to this default value, unless a different value is passed as a parameter to the constructor for a specific instance, by using the property.

summary.span: 释放 使用的所有托管资源，并引发 事件。

span.span: Releases all managed resources that are used by the , and raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法的 Internet 安全区域中不可用。This method is not available in the Internet security zone. 启动相关的 HWND 的清理工作。 initiates related cleanup work for the HWND. 如果调用通过不同于主 UI 线程的线程，直到它可以发送到主 UI 线程可能会延迟清理工作。If is called through a thread that is different from the main UI thread, the cleanup work may be deferred until it can be posted to the main UI thread. 调用显式互操作代码中可能所需的特定互操作方案，因为在某些互操作方案中可以生成对它跨互操作边界的多个引用这可能会阻止及时进行垃圾回收。Calling explicitly from the interoperating code might be necessary for certain interoperation scenarios, because an in some interoperation scenarios can generate several references to it across the interoperation boundaries that might prevent timely garbage collection.

summary.span: 对此对象调用 方法时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the method is called on this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过释放任何资源之前引发事件。The event is raised before any resources are released by the . 事件指示引发事件的对象即将所有引用了它删除。The event indicates that the object that raises the event is about to have all references to it removed. 使用并属性以避免调用两次 （这将引发异常）。Use and the property to avoid calling twice (which raises an exception).

summary.span: 已更改此 Hwnd 的监视器的 DPI 或 Hwnd 移动到具有不同 DPI 的监视器时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the DPI of the monitor of this Hwnd has changed, or the Hwnd is moved to a monitor with a different DPI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不可用或部分信任 Internet 安全区域，在一般情况下。This method is not available in the Internet security zone, or for partial trust in general. 您可以使用此方法返回并不显式互操作的窗口的窗口。You can use this method to return an for a window that is not explicitly an interoperation window. 此过程是：The procedure for this is: 1. 创建实例 (提供主作为构造函数参数)。Create a instance (providing the main as a constructor parameter). 2. 获取的值属性从的实例。Get the value of the property from that instance. 3. 将该 HWND 值作为参数传递。Pass that HWND value as a parameter to . 此技术很有用，如果随后想要添加常规消息处理的窗口。This technique can be useful if you then want to add general message processing to the window. 但是，每当创建，您也要负责销毁它。However, whenever you create an , you are also responsible for destroying it. 这是 true 即使应用程序的对象被释放。This is true even if the object for an application is disposed. 详细信息，请参阅备注上。For more information, see Remarks on .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于连接或另一个根视觉效果。Use this property to connect a or another root visual to the . 缩放转换应不会应用于的因为这可以禁用行为。Scale transformations should not be applied to the of an because this can disable behavior. 缩放内容，但封闭窗口不会。The content will scale, but the enclosing window will not. 而不是应用于对象，则转换，将转换应用到一个对象，它的子元素。Instead of applying the transformation to the object that is the , apply the transformation to an object that is a child element of the . 可能需要添加额外的封闭元素到[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]内容，如面板，以提供可缩放的对象。You might need to add an extra enclosing element to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content, such as a panel, in order to provide a scaleable object. 您可以添加作为根视觉对象，但仅作为顶级窗口 （包含 WS_OVERLAPPED)，而不是子窗口。You can add a as the root visual, but only as a top-level window (with WS_OVERLAPPED), not as a child window.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值声明是否遵守源窗口内容的每像素不透明度。

span.span: Gets a value that declares whether the per-pixel opacity of the source window content is respected.

value.span: 如果系统使用每像素不透明度，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the system uses per-pixel opacity; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果启用每像素不透明度，系统将不再绘制非工作区。When you enable per-pixel opacity, the system no longer draws the non-client area. 这是因为的预期的用途是要在互操作方案中显示非矩形顶级 UI。This is because the intended purpose of is to show non-rectangular top-level UI that works in interoperation scenarios. 因此，此目的，显示矩形的非工作区失败。Therefore, showing the rectangular non-client area defeats that purpose.
